New post on the Maya numeral system. I created a app that will let you count with the Maya numeral system
Maya Numeral Calculator
Welcome to the my new website!
Started working on website for Restaurant Jezebels in downtown Austin TX.

drawTriangles
blog.benjaminrubin.com

Stating on new website for
Herron Creative Works

I started a blog focused around Actionscript Development(Flash).
blog.benjaminrubin.com

Decided it was time to start makign a game. The game is called Lippisch, a top down jet shooter similar to Galaga.
Check out the demo
Finished my work for Community TechKnowledge
I will be working at Community Techknowledge this month as their Flash developer.

Started to work on a new website for a clothing company based in Philadelphia named TMGundy.
Their website is currently down.
Clic here to check it out on my server
Completed Brokerage Solutions Inc. website
Started working on a new website for Brokerage Solutions Inc.
Completed Bandwagon Films website.
Axios Studios helped to promote and advertise for Bandwagon Films current movie "Cowboy Smoke".
Stated working on the Bandwagon Films website. They are a production company badsed in Austin Texas, with a film in the Austin Film Festival.
